list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a rectangular cloth bag stuffed with feathers, foam rubber, or other soft materials, used to support the head when lying down.
rest (one's head) as if on a pillow.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his head was pillowed on his arm
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đầu anh ta được gối trên cánh tay của mình
